    • approveRegistration

      public void approveRegistration(Object courses, Student student, boolean intentionToAttend)
      Overrides the approveRegistration method from the Manager class. Allows the ORManager to approve student registrations for courses.
      Parameters:
      courses - The course or list of courses to be registered.
      student - The student requesting registration.
      intentionToAttend - A boolean indicating the intention to attend the courses.
